briefTitle: Long-term Safety and Tolerability of Subcutaneous Administration of TEV-48125 for the Preventive Treatment of Migraine
officialTitle: A Multicenter, Randomized, Open-label Trial Evaluating the Long-term Safety and Tolerability of Subcutaneous Administration of TEV-48125 for the Preventive Treatment of Migraine
summary: To evaluate the long-term safety and tolerability of subcutaneous (SC) administration of TEV-48125 (at 225 mg once monthly \[except for a loading dose of 675 mg for CM patients\] or at 675 mg every 3 months) for the preventive treatment of Chronic Migraine and Episodic Migraine patients

primaryOutcome.measure: Percentage of Subjects With at Least One Treatment-Emergent Adverse Event (TEAE)
